alert.note: Alert for Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Nassau, northeastern Bradford, southeastern Baker, northeastern Union, northwestern Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 324 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Maxville, or 12 miles northeast of Raiford, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Macclenny, Glen St. Mary, Cecil Field, Maxville, Sanderson, Oakleaf Plantation, Baldwin and Ellerbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baker; Bradford; Inland Nassau; Union; Western Clay; Western Duval
